hero.title: Quality Healthcare in Turkey
hero.subtitle: Dentistry, plastic surgery, hair transplantation and aesthetic medicine for clients from Germany and Europe — with full support from A to Z

why.title: Why Turkey?
why.subtitle: Turkey has become a global center for medical tourism thanks to the combination of quality, price and service

clinics.title: Modern Clinics
clinics.desc: International JCI accreditation, state-of-the-art equipment and world-class technology

doctors.title: Experienced Doctors
doctors.desc: Specialists with European education, internships in the USA and Germany

savings.title: Up to 60% Savings
savings.desc: Same materials and methods as in Germany, but at fair prices

fast.title: No Waiting
fast.desc: Fast treatment times — start within days of your inquiry

comfort.title: Comfort + Vacation
comfort.desc: Combine treatment with a vacation on the Mediterranean coast

guarantee.title: Guarantees
guarantee.desc: Official contracts, warranty on all procedures, aftercare support

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We work with the best clinics in Turkey in all areas of aesthetic and reconstructive medicine

dental.title: Dentistry
dental.desc: Implants, veneers, crowns, All-on-4. German and Swiss materials with lifetime warranty.

plastic.title: Plastic Surgery
plastic.desc: Rhinoplasty, breast augmentation, liposuction, face and body lift.

hair.title: Hair Transplant
hair.desc: FUE, DHI, Sapphire technique. Natural results forever.

aesthetic.title: Aesthetic Medicine
aesthetic.desc: Botox, fillers, mesotherapy, laser procedures, rejuvenation.

about.title: What We Actually Do
about.lead: We are an independent consulting and support service that protects your interests at every stage of treatment in Turkey.
about.text: We don't just 'refer you to a clinic' — we take over the entire process so you feel confident and safe.

features.selection: Selection of verified clinic and doctor
features.plan: Treatment plan and transparent cost calculation
features.translation: Translation and communication with the clinic
features.aftercare: Support before and after the procedure

audience.title: This solution is for you if...

items.germany: You live in Germany or the EU and are looking for quality treatment
items.quality: You want quality without overpaying — same materials, but cheaper
items.safety: You value safety, clarity and professional service
items.trust: You don't want to risk choosing a clinic blindly

process.title: 4 Simple Steps
process.subtitle: From first inquiry to result — we're by your side every step of the way

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.desc: We discuss your situation for free, answer questions, evaluate possibilities

plan.title: Treatment Plan
plan.desc: We select a clinic and doctor, create a detailed plan with exact costs

trip.title: Trip
trip.desc: We organize flight, transfer, accommodation. We meet you and accompany you personally

result.title: Result
result.desc: We monitor treatment quality, provide support after your return

team.title: Your Coordinators
team.subtitle: We speak your language and are always available

oleg.name: Oleg
oleg.desc: Coordinates all projects, monitors quality at every stage. Your main contact for any questions.

alexander.name: Alexander
alexander.desc: Specializes in dentistry. Helps with treatment planning and accompanies you at the clinic.

galina.name: Galina
galina.desc: Organizes trips and accommodation. Always available for organizational matters.

cta.title: Book a Free Consultation
cta.subtitle: no obligations
cta.text: We'll honestly tell you if treatment in Turkey is right for you and what alternatives exist. No pressure — just useful information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Leave a request — we'll call back within 24 hours

form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your situation or ask a question...
form.privacy: I agree to the processing of personal data
form.success: Thank you! We'll contact you soon.

footer.description: Quality healthcare in Turkey with full support for clients from Germany and Europe.

dental.heroDesc: Implants, veneers, crowns, All-on-4 using German and Swiss materials. Up to 70% savings compared to Germany.
dental.servicesSubtitle: Full range of modern dentistry with premium materials

implants.title: Dental Implants
implants.desc: Permanent solution for restoring lost teeth. Premium brands from Germany and Switzerland with lifetime manufacturer warranty.

crowns.title: Ceramic Crowns
crowns.desc: Restoring strength, shape and aesthetics of teeth. Highest quality with 5-year warranty.

veneers.title: Veneers
veneers.desc: Hollywood smile with ultra-thin overlays. Natural aesthetics for the perfect smile.

zirconium.title: Zirconium Crowns
zirconium.desc: Maximum strength combined with natural aesthetics. Ideal for front and back teeth.

allOn.title: All-on-4 / All-on-6
allOn.desc: Complete reconstruction on 4 or 6 implants. Fixed teeth for total tooth loss.

bone.title: Bone Grafting
bone.desc: Professional bone preparation for implantation. Modern techniques.

dental.pricingSubtitle: Same materials and quality — fair prices
dental.clinicSubtitle: Modern clinic in sunny Antalya with 20 years of experience

doctor.name: Dr. Mevlüt
doctor.desc: Over 20 years of experience in implantology and maxillofacial surgery. Specialization in complex cases and aesthetic dentistry.

dental.packageSubtitle: Comfortable stay without stress. You only take care of the flight.

hotel.title: Hotel
hotel.desc: Comfortable hotel with breakfast. Companion in the same room included.

transfer.title: VIP Transfer
transfer.desc: Airport pickup and all transfers between hotel and clinic.

support.title: Support
support.desc: Coordination from inquiry to departure in your language.

plan.title: Treatment Plan
plan.desc: Free plan before arrival with exact costs.

dental.packageNote: Free from €3,200: For treatments over €3,200, the full package is included free of charge.

comingSoon.text: This section is under development. Contact us for a free consultation!
